title: If Vlad has say a 4 second pool then Zhonya's's
body: Does the pools 4 second duration keep counting down during Zhonyas or does it freeze and continue the duration of pool when he comes out of zhonyas?

replies.body:
It overlaps, 
Vlad's main model is actually below ground and that becomes Zhonya's'd while the pool of blood around him is still a pool of blood.
Ah true so if he is 0.8 seconds through his 2 seconds of pool and zhonyas's for 2.5 seconds - when he comes out he is still pooled for another 1.2 seconds?

it should work the same as any other channel/overtime type spell , continuing to function as normal while the zhonyas is active . but why would you want to use hourglass while pooling? unlike most other spells you dont need to protect yourself while using it as your already made almost completely un-targetable. it would be a waste.

He was ignited in a clutch play and also Zhonya's'd right near the end of pool. Dots and ignites still hurt him in it 2.

I must have been imagining things or maybe it was a bug but it looked like he went into pool then Zhonya's'd and when Zhonya's ended he was still pooled for more than like half a second even though it only lasts 2 seconds and zhonya's is 2.5 seconds and its effect should have ended. I probably just spaced out or imagined it but I coulda sworn that's what happened.

just tested it. if you zhonyas during the pool theres a gold circle around the centre of the pool. you can still hear the sound too. when you come out of the pool the blood disappears and vlad doesnt show up and its just the golden circle
Oh ok - thank you. It looked like a Vladimir came out of Zhonyas and his pool hadn't been reducing in its 2 second timer but I must have had a lapse of attention.
i thought vlad couldnt use zhonyas while using W

"Since patch 4.11 Vladimir can use summoners spells and items during Sanguine Pool.".

There's a few weird things too - like if you spell shield block his Tranfusion he still gets the heal out of it.

Its 2 seconds but just had a vlad zhonyas during pool and it looked like it didn't continue counting down the pool duration during zhonyas so he came out then continued the remaining however many parts of its 2 second timer. Is that how it works?
